lead_paragraph: ELLENBERG--James Louis, formerly of Rye Brook NY, age 75, passed away January 9th, 2016. He is predeceased by his loving wife Joan Ellenberg, and his parents Louis and Claire Ellenberg. Jim is survived by his devoted sons, Larry (Robin) and Gregg (Tatum) and his adored grandchildren, Jordan, Max and Hatty as well as his loving sister Judi Falk (Maurice) Private funeral will be Monday followed by Shiva held Monday and Tuesday 4-8:30pm. Contact family for address. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ELLENBERG, JAMES LOUIS
